name: PADDLE (Stegersaurus)
description:
Chill out on a boat. Paddle around and have a nice, relaxing time on the water.

CONTROLS:
Mouse movements up/down - Control which side is dipped down into the water
Mouse movements left/right - Apply paddling force forwards/backwards

This game was made for Low Effort Jam 8 and was made in under a day.

Music:
"Water Lily" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
